Watching the screenshots its a no download for me. It just seems the same ppv rip upscaled to 720 p, but the same quality can imo easily be obtained with half the resolution and file size.
I know I've seen alot 360p material much much better than this. If the source is crap, its kinda useless to do a conversion to 720p, only little gain can be achieved with quarterpixel enhancement and bidirectional encoding etc etc, but still, you cant really polish a turd is the old saying I believe.
